radiographic_examinations.findings: Limited mobility of mitral valve leaflets in four-chamber view; all chordae inserted into the posteromedial PM; short-axis view detected posteromedial PM but not anterolateral PM; coarctation of the aorta and a small left ventricle.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The pregnancy was terminated at 30 weeks gestation due to high surgical risks; autopsy results confirmed the findings of echocardiography.

radiographic_examinations.findings: All chordae connected to elongated posteromedial PM with narrowing of interchordal spaces and decreased diameter at mitral valve opening; the anterolateral PM was fully attached to the ventricular wall.
